title: Ep 85: Christian Breaks the Meta
description:
In this Episode: We open with a woman who is faced with a tough decision and her BF judges her for it, we read about a BIL who has a bathroom routine that is getting under OPs skin, and a husband is making himself sick at his wife's expense, and a listener F'ed up their day trying to use a secret bathroom at work. And for this weeks Circle Jerdge we have a dramatic recreation of a conversation from the Judgies Discord.
 
Get Judgies Merch Here
 
Our Patreon is officially open, if you want to see extra content go check it out!  
 
Send us mail! (Addressed However You'd Like)

Intro Music by: Iván
